tool.name: qiime2 rescript degap-seqs
tool.description: Remove gaps from DNA sequence alignments.

param.name: aligned_sequences
param.label: aligned_sequences: FeatureData[AlignedSequence]
param.help: [required] Aligned DNA Sequences to be degapped.

param.name: min_length
param.label: min_length: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 1] Minimum length of sequence to be returned after degapping.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: rescript degap-seqs ============================ Remove gaps from DNA sequence alignments.
Outputs: -------- :degapped_sequences.qza: The resulting unaligned (degapped) DNA sequences.
|
Description: ------------ This method converts aligned DNA sequences to unaligned DNA sequences by removing gaps ("-") and missing data (".") characters from the sequences. Essentially, 'unaligning' the sequences.
|
